verses.content: Lal Solomon chu Israelhai po po chungah lalin a um tah a.
Hienghai hi a mi lien neihai chu an nih: Zadok naupa Azaria chu thiempu a na, Sisa naupahai Eliho- reph le Ahija chu lekha ziektu an na,
Ahilud naupa Jehosaphat chu chanchin ziektu a na.
Jehoiada naupa Benaia chu sipai hotu a na; Zadok le Abiathar chu thiempu an nih;
Nathan naupa Azaria chu hotu- hai chunga mi a na; Nathan naupa Zabud chu thiempu le lal ruolpa a na,
Ahisar chu insûng tieng hotu a na; Abda naupa Adoniram chu sin- thawa ruoi luihai hotu a nih.

Solomon chun Israel po pohai chunga chun hotu sâwmpahni a nei a, chuonghai chun lal ta ding le a sûngkuohai ta ding chun fâk ding an ngaituo hlak a, mi pakhatin kum khatah thla khat pei fâk ding a ngaituo ding a nih.
Chun, hieng hi an hminghai chu a nih: Ephraim tlâng ramah Ben-hur;
Makaz khuoa dâm, Saalbim khuoa dâm, Beth-semes khuoa dâm, Elonbeth-hanan khuoa dâm chun Ben-dekar a na;
Aruboth rama chun Ben-hesed a na, ama chun Soko le Hepher ram po po a chang sah a;
Dor zosâng ram po poah, Ben-abinadab a na; ama chun Solomon naunu Taphath chu nu- hmeiah a nei a;
Taanak khuo le Megiddo khuoa dâm, Jezreel khaw hnuoi Zarethan khaw bula um Beth-sean biel po poa dâm, Beth-seana inthawka Abel- meholah-a dâm, Jokmeam ram dep chenin Ahilud naupa Baana a na;

Ramoth-gilead khuoah Ben- geber, ama chun Manasse naupa Jair khuo, Gilead rama umhai chu a chang sah a; Basan rama Argob biel, khaw ropuitak tak khaw sâwmruk, kul le a kalna dâr tluon neihai khawm a chang sah a;
Mahanaim khuoah Iddo naupa Ahinadab a na;
Naphtali ramah Ahimaz a na; ama khawm chun Solomon naunu Basemath chu nuhmeiah a nei a;
Aser le Bealoth khuohaia chun Husai naupa Baana a na;
Issakar ramah Parua naupa Jehosaphat a na;
Benjamin ramah Ela naupa Simei a na;
Amorhai lal Sihon le Basan lal Og ram Gilead ramah Uria naupa Geber; chu rama chun hotu pakhat a um.
Judahai le Israelhai chu tui- suoriet pang ṭieu phaiphin zât zetin an tam a: an fâkin an dâwn a, hlimtakin an um hlak a.

Chuongchun, Solomon chun Vadunga inthawkin Philistin mihai ram le Aigupta ramri chenin ram po po chunga chun ro a rêl a; lâwm- manhai an hung chawi hlak a, Solomon dam sûng po chun a rawng an bâwl hlak a.
Solomon ni khat fâk khawp chu beiphit inditak tekhâwng sâwmthum le, beiphit narân tekhâwng sâwmruk a nih;
chun, bâwngchal thâutak sâwm, bâwngchal tla mi sâwmhni leh, berâm za leh, chuong naw khawm chu sakhihai dâm, sangaihai dâm, sakhi chalhai dâm, âr châwm thâuhai leh a nih.
Vadung râltieng ram po po, Tipsaa inthawka Gaza chenin; Va- dung râla lalhai po po chunga chun ân lal a; a vêla mihai po po le chun râlmuongin an um hlak a.
Chun, Solomon dam sûng po chun Judahai le Israelhai chu Dana inthawka Beer-seba khuo chenin mi tin mâni grêphrui bula le mâni thei- chang kûng bula chun lungmuong- takin an um seng a.
Chun, Solomon chun a tawlailîr siena dingin sakawr in sîng li le, sakawr chung chuong mi sîng khat le sâng hni a nei a.
Chuong hotuhai chun mâni chan thla peiah Solomon le lal Solomon dawkâna hung awt vetuhai po po fâk ding chu an ngaituo hlak a; pêk kim lo an nei ngai nawh.
Mi tinin an thaw dinga ruot ang peiin an umna ding hmuna chun sakawrhai le ran tlân hrâttakhai ta dingin buṭei le bupâwlhai an hung siekhâwl hlak a.
Chun, Pathienin Solomon chu varna le hrietna nasatak le, lungril lienna tuisuoriet panga ṭieu phaiphin ang el a pêk a.
Solomon varna chun khawsak nauhai po po varna le Aigupta mihai varna po po chu a khûm vawng a.
Mi po po nêkin a var lem a; Mahol nauhai, Ezra mi Ethan hai, Heman hai, Kalkol hai, Darda hai nêk khawmin; chuongchun, a vêl hnam po po lai chun a hming ân thang tah a.
Thuvarhai sâng thum a hril a; chun, a hlahai chu sâng khat le panga a nih.

Thing chanchin hai khawm, Lebanon tlânga sidar thinga in- thawka kula hung ṭo suok hussop chenin a hril hlak a; sa chanchin dâm, vate chanchin dâm, bawkinvâka lâwn mi chanchin dâm, nga chanchin dâm khawm a hril thei a.
Chuongchun, Solomon varna chanchin hre taphawthai chu khaw- vêla lalhai po poa inthawkin chi tina mi a varna ngai dingin an hung hlak a.
